title: How To Man? Gamestop's Got NFTs! 08.01.22
itunes:title: How To Man? Gamestop's Got NFTs! 08.01.22
description:
In episode 1299, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian and the latest contributor to Clown Parade, Martin Urbano, to discuss… Shattered Man wants to prove he is MAN, Marvel Movies Are Hell To Work On According To VFX Artists, GameStop Is The Latest Nostalgic Brand To Pivot To NFTs (And It Isn’t Going Well) and more!

  1. Shattered Man wants to prove he is MAN
  2. Marvel Movies Are Hell To Work On, According To VFX Artists
  3. Natalie Portman Says ‘Thor: Love and Thunder’ Shot Its Most Beautiful Scene in a Best Buy Parking Lot
  4. VFX Artist Calls Marvel 'Horrible' To Work For as Taika Waititi Mocks CGI
  5. Hollywood has gone home. Why are so many visual effects artists going into work?
  6. VFX Unionization Effort Struggles to Gain Traction
  7. GameStop Is The Latest Nostalgic Brand To Pivot To NFTs (And It Isn’t Going Well)
  8. GameStop Boss Celebrates NFT Marketplace Days After Laying People Off
  9. GameStop’s NFT Marketplace Is Here And It Is Bleak
  10. GameStop 9/11 NFT Pulled After Selling Dozens Of Times
  11. No, RadioShack's Twitter wasn't hacked. It sells cryptocurrency now.

LISTEN: I'm That Girl by Beyoncé

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
